Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41717 affecting package sriov-network-device-plugin for versions less than 3.7.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-41717 affecting package sriov-network-device-plugin for versions less than 3.7.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package sriov-network-device-plugin is earlier than 3.7.0-1, affected by CVE-2022-41717
